For some practical situations the introduction of sensors at only twenty locations gives a significant improvement of the calibration of an air quality model. The calibration of the low-cost measurements themselves with respect to the reference instruments is critical for any application. This calibration largely determines the model quality improvement due to the addition of low-cost measurements. The results shown in this paper can be used to optimize measurement strategy using low-cost measurements and/or sensors with established performance characteristics. The results can also be used to define the quality of the low-cost measurements that is required for useful applications. Using low-cost measurements can improve the quality of the calibrated model, even with a simultaneous reduction of the number of reference instruments. I.e., improved quality of information, at reduced costs.

explanation: 这项研究调查了在富氨环境下，特别是韩国Seosan地区，降低PM2.5中颗粒物硝酸盐（NO3−）的方法。研究通过冬季和秋季两次强化观测活动，发现氨气（NH3）在NO3−的形成中起关键作用，高浓度的NH3促进了颗粒物硝酸盐的生成，尤其是在PM2.5污染事件期间。利用 ISORROPIA-II 模型的敏感性分析表明，降低PM2.5的pH值到3.0以下，可以有效降低总硝酸盐的气粒分配比。减少总氨的浓度比减少其他前体物更有效地降低颗粒物NO3−的浓度。研究结果表明，在富氨环境下，减少氨气排放的政策可以有效缓解NO3−污染，从而改善农村地区的空气质量。该研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，因为它关注的是空气质量监测（PM2.5浓度，气态和颗粒物组分），并利用模型模拟来分析气溶胶的物理化学过程。虽然研究本身没有直接使用卫星观测数据，但其结果可用于改进大气成分分析模型，并为卫星遥感数据的解释提供参考。
topic_words: ['Particulate nitrate', 'Ammonia', 'Aerosol pH', 'Air quality monitoring', 'PM2.5', 'Gas-particle partitioning', 'ISORROPIA-II model', 'Ground-based measurements']
authors: Joonhyeok Choi;Jayant Nirmalkar;Kwangyul Lee;Mijung Song
title: Reducing particulate NO<sub>3</sub><sup>−</sup> of PM<sub>2.5</sub> under an ammonia-rich environment: Role of NH<sub>3</sub> and aerosol pH using ISORROPIA-II model
abstract:
•High NH3concentrations in Seosan were crucial in forming particulate nitrate, especially during PM2.5pollution episodes. •Reducing the pH of PM2.5below ∼3.0 significantly decreased the gas-particle partitioning ratio of total nitrate. •A reduction in total ammonia was more effective than other precursors in lowering particulate NO3−levels. 
 Nitrate pollution is a significant contributor to poor air quality and adverse health effects, especially in NH3-rich environments. This study investigated the reduction of particulate nitrate (NO3−) in Seosan, South Korea, an NH3-rich rural area, through two intensive campaigns conducted in winter (December 15, 2020–January 15, 2021) and autumn (November 10, 2022–December 10, 2022). Results showed that NH3 played a critical role in NO3− formation, with average NH3 concentrations of 6.7 ± 3.6 μg m−3. NO3− was the most abundant secondary inorganic aerosol throughout the study, especially during PM2.5 episodes (hourly PM2.5 ≥ 50 μg m−3), demonstrating a strong correlation between excess-NH4+ and NO3− concentrations. A sensitivity analysis using the ISORROPIA-II model revealed that reducing the pH of PM2.5 below 3.0 effectively decreased the gas-particle partitioning ratio of total nitrate, emphasizing the importance of total ammonia control. Specifically, ∼65% reduction in TNH3 reduced particulate NO3− concentrations by ∼20% in winter and ∼34% in autumn, with more pronounced effects during high PM2.5 alerts. This study indicates that under NH3-rich conditions, NH3 reduction policies could be effective for alleviating NO3− pollution and substantially improving air quality in rural areas.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种利用微波辐射计观测数据反演降雨期间低层大气温度剖面的新方法。以往微波辐射计在降雨情况下通常无法准确测量大气参数，因为雨滴会严重影响信号。该研究通过选择特定的频率和仰角，并排除某些频率和天顶观测，有效地降低了雨滴的影响，从而成功反演了降雨期间的低层温度剖面。研究结果表明，该方法在降雨强度小于2.5 mm h−1的情况下能够获得较好的精度，为提高天气预报和气候研究的准确性提供了新的途径。该方法的有效性通过与数值天气预报模式的对比结果进行了验证。
topic_words: ['temperature profile', 'microwave radiometer', 'atmospheric remote sensing', 'rain effect', 'numerical weather prediction']
authors: Andreas Foth;Moritz Lochmann;Pablo Saavedra Garfias;Heike Kalesse-Los
title: Determination of low-level temperature profiles from microwave radiometer observations during rain
abstract:
Microwave radiometers are usually not able to provide atmospheric quantities such as temperature profiles during rain. We present a method based on a selection of specific frequencies and elevation angles from microwave radiometer observations. A comparison with a numerical weather prediction model shows the presented method allows low-level temperature profiles during rain to be resolved, with rain rates of up to 2.5 mm h−1,, which was not possible before with state-of-the-art retrievals. 
 Usually, microwave radiometer observations have to be discarded during rain. The radomes of the receiver antenna get wet, which hampers accurate measurements since the retrieval algorithms to derive atmospheric quantities are not trained for rain events. The reason for the latter is, that the raindrops dominate the microwave signal compared to the weaker signal from atmospheric gases. To account for this, radiative transfer simulations need to include the electromagnetic properties of rain, which usually requires more complicated and expensive simulations. In this work, the performance of newly developed microwave radiometer retrievals that are not based on rain simulations is evaluated to assess how they work during rain events. It is shown that it is possible to retrieve low-level temperature profiles during rain by omitting certain frequencies and zenith observations. Retrievals with various combinations of elevation angles and frequencies are evaluated. We show that retrievals based on scanning mode observations with angles below 30° without zenith observation and only the less transparent upper four HATPRO microwave radiometer frequencies of the V-band (54.94, 56.66, 57.3, 58 GHz) provide the best results. An analysis of the calculated degrees of freedom of the signal shows that the retrieval of temperature profiles up to 3 km for no rain, 1.5 km for light to moderate rain, and 1 km for very heavy rain is driven by the HATPRO observation and not by climatology. Finally, the performance of the temperature profile retrieval is explained using a case study in Lindenberg, Germany, and evaluated with temperature profiles from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts (ECMWF) model for different rainfall intensities. The results show that the higher the rainfall rate, the larger the deviation of the retrieved microwave radiometer temperature profile from the ECMWF model output. The proposed retrievals for temperature profiles up to at least 1.5 km for rain rates below 0.5 and below 2.5 mm h−1 have uncertainties of less than 1 and 2 K, respectively, compared to ECMWF model output profiles.

explanation: 这篇论文介绍了一种结合传统辐射传输模拟和机器学习方法的云属性反演方法。该方法利用机器学习算法提供先验状态，并使用辐射传输模型创建查找表以进行迭代过程。它克服了传统方法在反演厚云光学厚度方面的不足，以及机器学习方法缺乏明确物理过程的缺点。研究使用了MODIS卫星的热红外辐射数据，并将该方法与单独的优化估计方法和机器学习方法进行了比较，结果表明该方法在云属性反演方面具有更好的性能，模拟的辐射与观测值更接近，并且明确处理了物理辐射过程。总的来说，该研究利用机器学习技术改进传统的遥感技术，提高了云属性反演的精度和可靠性，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['cloud properties', 'thermal infrared', 'remote sensing', 'satellite observations', 'MODIS', 'radiative transfer', 'cloud optical thickness', 'atmospheric composition', 'machine learning']
authors: He Huang;Quan Wang;Chao Liu;Chen Zhou
title: Optimal estimation of cloud properties from thermal infrared observations with a combination of deep learning and radiative transfer simulation
abstract:
This study introduces a cloud property retrieval method which integrates traditional radiative transfer simulations with a machine learning method. Retrievals from a machine learning algorithm are used to provide a priori states, and a radiative transfer model is used to create lookup tables for later iteration processes. The new method combines the advantages of traditional and machine learning algorithms, and it is applicable to both daytime and nighttime conditions. 
 While traditional thermal infrared retrieval algorithms based on radiative transfer models (RTMs) could not effectively retrieve the cloud optical thickness of thick clouds, machine-learning-based algorithms were found to be able to provide reasonable estimations for both daytime and nighttime. Nevertheless, stand-alone machine learning algorithms are occasionally criticized for the lack of explicit physical processes. In this study, RTM simulations and a machine learning algorithm are synergistically utilized using the optimal estimation (OE) method to retrieve cloud properties from thermal infrared radiometry measured by the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS). In the new algorithm, retrievals from a machine learning algorithm are used to provide a priori states for the iterative process of the OE method, and an RTM is used to create radiance lookup tables that are used in the iteration processes. Compared with stand-alone OE, the cloud properties retrieved by the new algorithm show an overall better performance by using statistical a priori information obtained by the machine learning algorithm. Compared with the stand-alone machine-learning-based algorithm, the radiances simulated based on retrievals from the new method align more closely with observations, and physical radiative processes are handled explicitly in the new algorithm. Therefore, the new method combines the advantages of RTM-based cloud retrieval methods and machine learning models. These findings highlight the potential for machine-learning-based algorithms to enhance the efficacy of conventional remote sensing techniques.

explanation: 这篇论文介绍了一种利用Aeolus卫星搭载的大气激光多普勒仪器(ALADIN)的激光雷达地表回波(LSR)数据反演地表紫外反射率的新算法。该算法结合了ALADIN的衰减反向散射参数和地表探测信息，生成经过大气衰减校正的地表回波估计值。研究结果表明，Aeolus LSR数据与其他卫星(如GOME-2和TROPOMI)的紫外反射率数据吻合良好，对雪盖的敏感性极佳。该研究扩展了Aeolus数据的应用，为大气环境遥感，特别是气溶胶、云和地表反射率的监测提供了新的数据源。论文还讨论了该算法在不同区域和时间尺度上的适用性，以及与其他地表参数(如植被指数)的相关性。总的来说，这项工作对于提高大气成分分析的精度和完善大气环境遥感技术具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['Aerosol', 'Cloud', 'UV reflectivity', 'Surface reflectance', 'Lidar', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Aeolus', 'ALADIN', 'Atmospheric composition', 'Air quality monitoring', 'GOME-2', 'TROPOMI', 'Snow cover']
authors: Lev D. Labzovskii;Gerd-Jan van Zadelhoff;David P. Donovan;Jos de Kloe;L. Gijsbert Tilstra;Ad Stoffelen;Damien Josset;Piet Stammes
title: Aeolus lidar surface return (LSR) at 355 nm as a new Aeolus Level-2A product
abstract:
The Atmospheric Laser Doppler Instrument (ALADIN) on the Aeolus satellite was the first of its kind to measure high-resolution vertical profiles of aerosols and cloud properties from space. We present an algorithm that produces Aeolus lidar surface returns (LSRs), containing useful information for measuring UV reflectivity. Aeolus LSRs matched well with existing UV reflectivity data from other satellites, like GOME-2 and TROPOMI, and demonstrated excellent sensitivity to modeled snow cover. 
 The Atmospheric Laser Doppler Instrument (ALADIN) aboard Aeolus was the first spaceborne high-resolution lidar and measured vertical profiles of aerosol optical properties at 355 nm at an incidence angle of ∼ 35°. Although Aeolus was primarily developed to provide vertical profiles of wind speed, aerosols and cloud products, its lidar surface returns (LSRs) have been shown to contain useful information about ultraviolet (UV) surface reflectivity and have agreed well with passive remote sensing reflectance. With a focus on the process to incorporate the LSR algorithm into the Aeolus Level-2A product, we describe the methodology and evaluate the results of the adopted LSR retrieval. The algorithm combines attenuated backscattering parameters (Level-2 Aeolus Profile Processor Algorithm, L2 AEL-PRO, data) with information on the surface bin detection (Level-1 data) to produce attenuated LSR estimates (e.g., surface-integrated attenuated backscatter) for all bins where the ground was detected. The correction for producing final LSR estimates at the original Aeolus resolution is performed using the Aeolus L2 retrievals, namely, the aerosol optical depth (AOD) and Rayleigh optical depth, to ensure that LSRs are free of the effects of atmospheric attenuating features, such as optically thick clouds and thick aerosol conditions (AOD > 1.0). The evaluation shows that Aeolus LSR estimates produced using this approach agree well with the UV Lambertian-equivalent reflectivity (LER) from the Global Ozone Monitoring Experiment-2 (GOME-2; LERG) and TROPOspheric Monitoring Instrument (TROPOMI; LERT) climatologies at all spatial scales. For four reference orbits (10 September 2018, 30 November 2018, 11 January 2019 and 1 May 2019), all cloud and aerosol-free LSR estimates agree well with both LER references, with correlation coefficient (r) values varying from 0.55 to 0.71. For monthly scales, the agreement was moderate to high for the LSR–LERT  comparison (r = 0.61–0.77 depending on the month) and weak to moderate for the LSR–LERG comparison (r = 0.44–0.64). Globally, the averaged 2.5° × 2.5° LSR estimates exhibit very high agreement with both the LERG (0.90) and LERT (0.92) references. With respect to reproducing the regional monthly dynamics, LSR and LER agree very well in snow- or ice-covered regions (r > 0.90), semiarid regions (r > 0.90), arid regions (r > 0.70), and some regions with mixed vegetation (like Australia; r = 0.94), whereas no agreement was found for ocean regions due to the Aeolus optical setup, which is favorable for the ocean subsurface but not for direct surface backscatter probing. We unveiled four reflectivity clusters of LSRs at the 2.5° × 2.5° grid scale, manifesting a transition from white to darker surfaces in descending LSR magnitude order: (1) ice, (2) snow, (3) surface without snow and (4) water. Regionally, the LSR–LER agreement can vary and yields the highest correlation values in regions where snow is present in winter, indicating the excellent sensitivity of Aeolus LSRs to white surfaces such as snow. This finding is corroborated by the very good agreement of LSRs with modeled snow cover that we demonstrated (r = 0.62–0.74 between these parameters in such regions), while the sensitivity to purely vegetation-driven changes in the surface is lower, as indicated by the comparison between LSRs and the normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) without snow (r < 0.30 in the regional analysis). By demonstrating the usability of LSRs for scientific applications at non-nadir angles, our work deepens the knowledge about LSRs, which has mostly been based on nadir-looking Cloud–Aerosol Lidar and Infrared Pathfinder Satellite Observations (CALIPSO) studies in the past. Using experiences from both the nadir-looking CALIPSO and the highly non-nadir Aeolus mission, a framework for the effective LSR utilization using future lidar missions such as EarthCARE and Aeolus-2 can be effectively designed.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注2018年南极洲东部冬季的显著正温度异常现象。文章利用观测数据和ERA5再分析资料，诊断了这一现象的成因。研究发现，300百帕高度的温度异常主要由平流和绝热过程驱动，而700百帕高度则受到非绝热过程的显著影响。海冰减少、下沉运动增强以及海气温差增大共同导致了非绝热加热的变化。降水增加也导致了局部变暖。南极涛动负位相相关的增压是影响平流、绝热和非绝热过程的主要原因。虽然文章没有直接提到具体的空气质量监测或大气成分分析技术，但其利用再分析数据（例如ERA5）和观测数据来研究温度、气压、降水和海冰等大气参数，这些数据通常来源于卫星遥感和地面观测站，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['temperature anomalies', 'atmospheric pressure', 'sea ice', 'precipitation', 'reanalysis data', 'ERA5', 'satellite observations', 'remote sensing']
authors: Yulong Shan;Jinfeng Ding;Xiaoqian Zhu;Wei Qi;Lei Liu;Xichuan Liu;Minghu Ding
title: Study on the Positive Temperature Anomalies in East Antarctica During the Winter of 2018
abstract: East Antarctica has experienced significant positive temperature anomalies during winter 2018, with Zhongshan (ZS) station recording its highest winter average temperature since 2008 and fourth highest since its establishment in 1989. This study employs observational data and ERA5 reanalysis to diagnose the phenomenon, revealing that temperature anomalies at 300 hPa are mainly driven by advection and adiabatic processes, which is the second highest recorded from 2000 to 2020. However, diabatic process are significantly important at 700 hPa, being the third highest during the period. The reduction in sea ice, combined with enhanced sinking motion and increased sea‐air temperature difference, together contributes to the variations of diabatic heating. The increased precipitation, exceeding the historical average by 100% along the southwestern shore of Prydz Bay, further induces localized warming. The increased atmospheric pressure associated with the negative Southern Annular Mode phase is the primary cause influencing the advection, adiabatic, and diabatic processes.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用卫星观测数据改进高山地区积雪水当量（SWE）模拟的方法。研究人员利用位于德国楚格峰的超导重力仪观测了季节性积雪对重力的影响，以此反映SWE随时间的变化。他们将这些观测结果与两种不同的Alpine3D分布式积雪模型进行了比较：一种使用气象站数据，另一种使用来自Pléiades卫星的8米分辨率积雪深度图像对降水数据进行修正。结果表明，卫星观测数据显著提高了融雪季节积雪重力效应的模拟精度。这意味着卫星数据可以有效地增强对高山地区SWE的分析，尤其是在基础设施有限的地区。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用了卫星遥感技术获取积雪深度信息，并将其应用于水文模拟和水资源管理。
topic_words: ['snow water equivalent', 'snow depth', 'satellite observations', 'remote sensing', 'snow hydrology', 'Pléiades satellite', 'Alpine3D snow model', 'gravimetry', 'water resources management']
authors: F. Koch;S. Gascoin;K. Achmüller;P. Schattan;K.‐F. Wetzel;C. Deschamps‐Berger;M. Lehning;T. Rehm;K. Schulz;C. Voigt
title: Superconducting Gravimeter Observations Show That a Satellite‐Derived Snow Depth Image Improves the Simulation of the Snow Water Equivalent Evolution in a High Alpine Site
abstract: The lack of accurate information on the spatiotemporal variations of snow water equivalent (SWE) in mountain catchments remains a key problem in snow hydrology and water resources management. This is partly because there is no sensor to measure SWE beyond local scale. At Mt. Zugspitze, Germany, a superconducting gravimeter senses the gravity effect of the seasonal snow, reflecting the temporal evolution of SWE in a few kilometers scale radius. We used this new observation to evaluate two configurations of the Alpine3D distributed snow model. In the default run, the model was forced with meteorological station data. In the second run, we applied precipitation correction based on an 8 m resolution snow depth image derived from satellite observations (Pléiades). The snow depth image strongly improved the simulation of the snowpack gravity effect during the melt season. This result suggests that satellite observations can enhance SWE analyses in mountains with limited infrastructure.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用CryoSat-2和ICESat-2卫星数据监测格陵兰冰盖海拔变化的方法，并评估了这两种方法的一致性。研究结果表明，这两种卫星数据在格陵兰冰盖内部和消融带的年际变化趋势上基本一致，但在东南部的崎岖地形地区一致性较差。通过结合这两种卫星数据，研究人员估算了2010年至2022年格陵兰冰盖的总体冰量损失。这项研究属于大气环境遥感技术范畴，因为它利用卫星遥感技术监测冰盖变化，而冰盖变化与气候变化和大气环境密切相关。
topic_words: ['Satellite observation', 'CryoSat-2', 'ICESat-2', 'Greenland ice sheet', 'Elevation change', 'Surface mass balance', 'Remote sensing', 'Glacier monitoring']
authors: Nitin Ravinder;Andrew Shepherd;Inès Otosaka;Thomas Slater;Alan Muir;Lin Gilbert
title: Greenland Ice Sheet Elevation Change From CryoSat‐2 and ICESat‐2
abstract: Although fluctuations in ice sheet surface mass balance lead to seasonal and interannual elevation changes, it is unclear if they are resolved differently by radar and laser satellite altimeters. We compare methods of computing elevation change from CryoSat‐2 and ICESat‐2 over the Greenland Ice Sheet to assess their consistency and to quantify recent change. Solutions exist such that interannual trends in the interior and the ablation zone agree to within −0.2 ± 1.5 and 3.3 ± 6.0 cm/yr, respectively, and that seasonal cycle amplitudes within the ablation zone agree to within 3.5 ± 38.0 cm. The agreement is best in the north where the measurements are relatively dense and worst in the southeast where the terrain is rugged. Using both missions, we estimate Greenland lost 196 ± 37 km3/yr of volume between 2010 and 2022 with an interannual variability of 129 km3/yr.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了生物质燃烧排放的冰核粒子 (INPs) 对气候的影响。它定量分析了2019年生物质燃烧产生的INPs数量，并探讨了其时空分布。研究发现，虽然生物质燃烧产生的INPs数量比沙尘 aerosol 少得多，但比海洋有机 aerosol 多得多，并且在北半球高纬度地区和南半球部分地区的影响更为显著，尤其是在野火高峰期。东亚地区的住宅生物质燃烧也做出了相当大的贡献。该研究强调了生物质燃烧在评估冰核粒子数量和影响中的重要性，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，例如利用卫星观测来监测生物质燃烧的时空分布，以及利用大气成分分析技术来研究INPs的特性和浓度。
topic_words: ['Ice Nucleating Particles', 'Biomass Burning', 'Aerosol', 'Satellite Observation', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Atmospheric Composition', 'Wildfires', 'Climate Effects', 'INPs']
authors: Xucheng Zhao;Ke Jiang;Shuyu Ou'yang;Yaojie Li;Yang Wang;Jiandong Wang;Nan Zhao;Guofeng Shen
title: Global Biomass Burning Emission Contributions to Ice Nucleating Particles
abstract: Biomass burning (BB) can produce ice nucleating particles (INPs) and influence cloud ice formation and climate effects, but the distribution and budget of BB‐induced INPs are not well understood. This study quantified INPs from BB at −17°C to −30°C and explored their spatiotemporal distributions. The results indicate that the INPs of BB aerosol were 5.42 × 1021 in 2019, approximately two orders of magnitude lower than those of dust aerosol, but much more than those of marine organic aerosol. Globally, INPs from BB were mainly influenced by wildfires, but in regions like East Asia, residential BB contributed significantly, accounting for about 57%. INPs from BB would have more pronounced effects in high latitudes of the Northern Hemisphere and parts of the Southern Hemisphere, particularly during peak wildfire periods. Thus, BB should be unignorable in evaluating the fates and impacts of INPs.

explanation: 这篇论文利用NASA的GOLD和ICON卫星观测数据，研究了北半球大气层中氧原子和氮分子比例(O/N2)在春秋分季节转换期的变化特征。研究发现，O/N2比例的春秋分转换存在纬度和季节差异，春季转换速度远慢于秋季。ICON卫星观测到中高层大气中夏季到冬季环流的显著不对称性，表明了半球间环流在O/N2转换中的重要作用。此外，论文还推测低层大气的波驱经向环流也影响了O/N2的春秋分转换。总而言之，该研究利用卫星遥感技术，对大气成分（O/N2比例）和环流变化进行了深入分析，与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['Thermospheric composition', 'atomic oxygen', 'molecular nitrogen', 'O/N2 ratio', 'Meridional circulation', 'Satellite observations', "NASA's GOLD mission", "NASA's ICON mission", 'Atmospheric remote sensing', 'Equinox transition']
authors: Q. Gan;L. Qian;N. M. Pedatella;R. W. Eastes
title: Equinox Transitions of Thermosphere O/N2 and Meridional Circulation in the Northern Hemisphere as Observed by NASA's GOLD and ICON Missions
abstract: Leveraging the unique perspective enabled by Global‐scale Observations of the Limb and Disk, we examined the characteristics of equinox transitions in the thermospheric column integrated ratio of atomic oxygen to molecular nitrogen (O/N2) in the Northern Hemisphere. We found that the timing of the O/N2 equinox transition from winter to summer or vice versa exhibits a progression with latitude, particularly, near spring equinox. The O/N2 equinox transition is far slower during spring compared to fall, leading to a remarkable seasonal asymmetry. Ionospheric Connection Explorer observed a prominent asymmetry in the summer‐to‐winter circulation in the middle to upper thermosphere, implying that the inter‐hemispheric circulation plays a crucial role in the O/N2 equinox transition. Additionally, since the wave‐driven meridional circulation in the lower thermosphere displays a seasonal asymmetry between the northward‐to‐southward and southward‐to‐northward transitions, we would anticipate that the O/N2 equinox transition is also influenced by the lower atmospheric forcing.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了一种利用风云四号A卫星上的先进静止辐射成像仪（AGRI）和静止干涉红外探测仪（GIIRS）进行全天候云宏观物理特性反演的新方法。该方法基于机器学习，反演参数包括单层云相态、云顶高度和云底高度（光学厚度小于10）。研究结果表明，融合GIIRS晴空柱辐射可以提高云相态分类和云宏观物理特性反演的精度，并有效替代了传统热红外遥感反演中所需的温度和湿度廓线数据，从而实现云宏观物理特性的近实时和全天候反演。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测数据反演大气中的云特性，这对于天气预报、气候研究和环境监测等应用具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['cloud macro-physical properties', 'satellite observations', 'geostationary satellite', 'FY-4A', 'AGRI', 'GIIRS', 'remote sensing', 'cloud phase', 'cloud top height', 'cloud base height', 'optical thickness', 'atmospheric temperature', 'atmospheric moisture', 'machine learning']
authors: Bin Guo;Feng Zhang;Zhijun Zhao;Jinyu Guo;Wenwen Li
title: Retrieval of Cloud Macro‐Physical Properties Using theFY‐4A Advanced Geostationary Radiation Imager (AGRI) and the Geostationary Interferometric Infrared Sounder (GIIRS)
abstract: This study presents a novel approach for conducting all‐day retrieval of cloud macro‐physical properties (single‐layer cloud phase, cloud top height, and cloud base height for optical thickness less than 10) using the Advanced Geostationary Radiation Imager (AGRI) and the Geostationary Interferometric Infrared Sounder (GIIRS) onboard the geostationary meteorological satellite Fengyun‐4A based on machine learning methods. Model accuracy was compared after integrating ECMWF Reanalysis v5 (ERA‐5) data, atmospheric temperature and moisture profiles, and GIIRS clear‐column radiance. Results demonstrate that integrating GIIRS clear‐column radiances can enhance the precision of cloud phase classification and the retrieval of cloud macro‐physical properties. This effectively replaces the role of atmospheric temperature and humidity profiles, which are typically required for thermal infrared remote sensing retrieval. Moreover, the issue of delayed acquisition of ERA‐5 atmospheric temperature and humidity profiles is mitigated, enabling near real‐time and all‐day retrieval of cloud macro‐physical properties.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了在成分变化的大气（例如地球的热层和其他行星大气）中，Eliassen-Palm (EP)通量和Bretherton-Garrett (BG)守恒方程的适用性。研究发现，标准的BG/EP守恒方程在成分变化时不再成立，因为它们假设平均状态熵和压力之间存在固定的联系，而这种联系在成分变化时会失效。因此，论文推导出了新的熵修正(EC)形式的方程，这些方程在成分变化的大气中守恒总能量和动量。论文通过三种独立的推导方法得到了相同的EC方程形式及其相关的诊断，例如非加速条件。由于EC形式是对标准BG/EP方程的修正比例因子，因此现有的模型和诊断很容易推广。热层计算结果表明，EC方程消除了高达40%的系统能量和动量偏差，这反过来又导致稳定守恒波的振幅随着高度的增加而增长得更快。 这项研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它直接涉及大气成分分析（特别是热层成分），并对理解大气波的能量和动量传输具有重要意义，这对于改进大气模型和卫星观测数据的解释至关重要。
topic_words: ['Thermospheric composition', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Satellite observations', 'Wave action', 'Energy and momentum conservation', 'Air density']
authors: Stephen D. Eckermann
title: Wave Action Conservation, Eliassen‐Palm Flux and Nonacceleration Conditions Within Atmospheres of Variable Composition
abstract: The foundational conservation equations of Eliassen and Palm (EP) and Bretherton and Garrett (BG) governing the pseudomomentum and action of waves in geophysical fluids are shown to be approximations that do not hold generally within atmospheres of varying mass composition, such as the Earth's thermosphere and other planetary atmospheres. Standard BG/EP conservation equations assume a fixed connection between mean‐state entropy and pressure that breaks down when composition varies. New entropy‐corrected (EC) forms of these equations are derived that conserve total energy and momentum in atmospheres where composition varies. Three separate and largely independent derivations are presented that all lead to the same EC forms of these equations and their associated diagnostics, such as nonacceleration conditions. Since EC forms present as corrective scaling factors to standard BG/EP equations, existing models and diagnostics are easily generalized. Representative thermospheric calculations reveal that the EC equations remove systematic energy and momentum biases of up to 40% that in turn lead steady conservative waves to grow more rapidly in amplitude with increasing altitude.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了2019-2020年澳大利亚、加利福尼亚和西伯利亚特大火灾产生的生物质燃烧气溶胶（BBA）的特性及其直接辐射效应。研究使用了全球气候模拟（ARPEGE-Climat）和参考气溶胶数据集（再分析数据、地面观测和卫星数据）进行比较。结果表明，为了真实地再现火灾事件中对流层和平流层下层观测到的消光垂直剖面，需要限制模型中的注入高度。如果没有火灾的特定垂直排放剖面，ARPEGE-Climat模拟将无法再现气溶胶消光垂直剖面。在研究的每个区域，模拟的气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）都非常高（在550 nm处超过3）。研究还显示了澳大利亚和加利福尼亚排放的BBA的重要长距离传输，在远离源头的地区AOD仍然很高。这些极其浓密的烟羽会显著扰动地表入射太阳辐射，并对地表产生较大的直接（地表）短波辐射效应，澳大利亚（2020年1月）、加利福尼亚（2020年9月）和西伯利亚（2019年8月）的月平均值分别高达-13、-29和-17 W m-2。当浓密且强烈吸收的烟羽平流到具有高地表反照率的海洋云区时，在大气顶部发现了值得注意的正BBA直接辐射效应（增温）。这种吸收导致太阳加热率增加高达0.3 K天-1，可能对大气温度和动力学产生影响。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它使用了卫星数据分析气溶胶的光学特性和辐射效应，并研究了空气质量和大气成分的变化。
topic_words: ['Biomass burning aerosols', 'Aerosol optical depth', 'Satellite data', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Radiative effect', 'Atmospheric composition', 'Pyroconvection', 'Long-range transport']
authors: Thomas Vescovini;Pierre Nabat;Marc Mallet;Fabien Solmon
title: Aerosol Direct Radiative Effects From Extreme Fire Events in Australia, California and Siberia Occurring in 2019–2020
abstract: This study aims at investigating the biomass burning aerosols (BBA) from 2019 to 2020 extreme wildfires in California, Australia and Siberia, in terms of aerosol characteristics and direct radiative effect. This study is based on the comparison between global climate simulations (ARPEGE‐Climat) and reference aerosol data sets (reanalyzes, ground‐based observations and satellite data). First, our results demonstrate the need to constrain the injection heights in the model in order to realistically represent extinction vertical profiles observed during fire events, both in the troposphere and in the lower stratosphere due to the contribution of pyro‐convection. Without specific vertical emission profiles for fires, the ARPEGE‐Climat simulations fail in representing aerosol extinction vertical profiles. For each region studied, the modeled aerosol optical depth (AOD) is extremely high (above 3 at 550 nm). An important long‐range transport of BBA emitted in Australia and California is shown, with high AOD further from sources. These extremely dense plumes significantly perturb the surface incident solar radiation and exert a large direct (surface) shortwave radiative effect up to −13, −29 and −17 W m−2 ${\mathrm{m}}^{-2}$ on monthly average over Australia (January 2020), California (September 2020) and Siberia (August 2019), respectively. A noteworthy positive BBA direct radiative effect (warming) is found at the top of the atmosphere, when dense and strongly absorbing smoke plumes are advected over cloudy oceanic regions, characterized by high surface albedo. This absorption leads to an increase of the solar heating rate up to 0.3 K day−1 ${\text{day}}^{-1}$ with possible implications on the atmospheric temperature and dynamics.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了全球变暖下南亚季风降雨的响应，发现季风环流的不确定性包含两个部分抵消的因素：一个与全球热力学约束相关的减弱分量，以及一个可以通过区域二维能量视角理解的北移分量。研究表明，南亚季风环流的北移主要归因于欧亚大陆上空的正云反馈和南大洋的热量吸收。气候模式模拟结果支持南亚季风降雨增加主要源于由高纬过程驱动的环流北移。该研究通过将环流变化与辐射强迫、反馈和海洋热量吸收联系起来，为预测季风降雨提供了新的途径。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用气候模式模拟结果来研究大气环流和降雨变化，这与卫星观测和大气成分分析等遥感技术高度相关。
topic_words: ['cloud feedback', 'ocean heat uptake', 'monsoon rainfall', 'climate model', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric circulation', 'radiative forcing']
authors: Yong-Jhih Chen;Yen-Ting Hwang;Jian Lu
title: Robust increase in South Asian monsoon rainfall under warming driven by extratropical clouds and ocean
abstract:
Robust increase in South Asian monsoon rainfall under warming driven by extratropical clouds and ocean 
 The responses of South Asian Monsoon (SAM) circulation under global warming are known to be highly uncertain, leading to the widespread of SAM rainfall projections among models. Here, we show that the uncertain SAM circulation in Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6 models consists of two robust components that partly offset each other: a weakening component linked to a global thermodynamic constraint and a northward shift component understood through a regional 2D energetic perspective. We further attribute the robust northward shift of SAM circulation to positive cloud feedback over the Eurasia Continent and heat uptake in the Southern Ocean. A set of climate model simulations supports the finding that SAM rainfall increase is primarily due to the northward shift of circulation driven by extratropical processes. This energetic perspective opens new avenues for predicting monsoon rainfall by connecting circulation changes to radiative forcing, feedbacks, and ocean heat uptake.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了澳大利亚季风对印度洋年际变率（特别是印度洋偶极子IOD和三极子IOT）的影响，以及这种影响在全球变暖背景下如何增强。研究发现，强烈的澳大利亚季风通过风-蒸发-海表温度机制引起局部海表温度变化，进而触发东印度洋的大气环流异常，改变海洋热输送，最终影响IOT的形成。 这意味着，利用卫星观测海表温度、大气环流等数据，可以更好地理解和预测印度洋气候变率。 论文揭示了澳大利亚季风与IOT之间联系的增强，这与ENSO和IOD之间联系减弱的趋势形成对比，体现了全球变暖背景下印度洋气候系统演变的复杂性。
topic_words: ['Sea surface temperature (SST)', 'Atmospheric circulation', 'Satellite observations', 'Oceanic heat transport', 'Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD)', 'Indian Ocean Tripole (IOT)', 'Australian Monsoon', 'Climate change']
authors: Mengyan Chen;Matthew Collins;Jin-Yi Yu;Xin Wang;Lei Zhang;Chi-Yung Tam
title: Emerging influence of the Australian Monsoon on Indian Ocean interannual variability in a warming climate
abstract:
Emerging influence of the Australian Monsoon on Indian Ocean interannual variability in a warming climate 
 The Indian Ocean Dipole (IOD) and Tripole (IOT) represent primary modes of interannual variability in the Indian Ocean, impacting both regional and global climate. Unlike the IOD, which is closely related to the El Niño-Southern Oscillation (ENSO), our findings unveil a substantial influence of the Australian Monsoon on the IOT. An anomalously strong Monsoon induces local sea surface temperature (SST) variations via the wind-evaporation-SST mechanism, triggering atmospheric circulation anomalies in the eastern Indian Ocean. These circulation changes lead to changes in oceanic heat transport, facilitating the formation of the IOT. Our analysis reveals a strengthening connection between the Australian Monsoon and the IOT in recent decades, with a projected further strengthening under global warming. This contrasts with the diminished coupling between ENSO and IOD in recent decades from observations and model projections, illustrating evolving Indian Ocean dynamics under the warming climate.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了HFC-23的排放量，这是一种强效的温室气体。研究人员利用大气观测数据和反向建模方法估算了全球HFC-23的排放量，发现实际排放量远高于各国根据《基加利修正案》报告的数值。这表明，尽管国际社会做出了减排承诺，但HFC-23的排放量仍然很高，与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，例如利用卫星观测和大气成分分析来监测空气质量和温室气体浓度。研究结果揭示了减排工作中存在差距，为改进温室气体排放监测和控制策略提供了重要依据。
topic_words: ['HFC-23', 'Greenhouse gas emissions', 'Atmospheric measurements', 'Inverse modelling', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Satellite observations', 'Air quality monitoring']
authors: Ben Adam;Luke M. Western;Jens Mühle;Haklim Choi;Paul B. Krummel;Simon O’Doherty;Dickon Young;Kieran M. Stanley;Paul J. Fraser;Christina M. Harth;Peter K. Salameh;Ray F. Weiss;Ronald G. Prinn;Jooil Kim;Hyeri Park;Sunyoung Park;Matt Rigby
title: Emissions of HFC-23 do not reflect commitments made under the Kigali Amendment
abstract:
Substantial hydrofluorocarbon-23 emissions persist despite international reduction commitments: Emissions estimates based on inverse modelling of atmospheric measurements and transport exceeded reported values by more than five times in 2021. 
 HFC-23 (trifluoromethane) is a potent greenhouse gas released to the atmosphere primarily as a by-product of HCFC-22 (chlorodifluoromethane) synthesis. Since 2020, the Kigali Amendment to the Montreal Protocol has required Parties to destroy their HFC-23 emissions to the extent possible. Here, we present updated HFC-23 emissions estimated from atmospheric observations. Globally, emissions fell to 14.0 ± 0.9 Gg yr-1 in 2023 from their maximum in 2019 of 17.3 ± 0.8 Gg yr-1, but remained five times higher than reported in 2021. Atmospheric observation-based emissions for eastern China, the world’s largest HCFC-22 producer, were also found to be substantially higher than 2020-2022 reported emissions. We estimate that potential HFC-23 sources not directly linked to HCFC-22 production explain only a minor, albeit highly uncertain, fraction of this discrepancy. Our findings suggest that HFC-23 emissions have not been destroyed to the extent reported by the Parties since the implementation of the Kigali Amendment. Substantial hydrofluorocarbon-23 emissions persist despite international reduction commitments: Emissions estimates based on inverse modelling of atmospheric measurements and transport exceeded reported values by more than five times in 2021.

explanation: 这篇研究论文利用卫星数据、气象数据和贸易数据，结合网络分析方法，评估了俄乌战争对全球冬小麦生产和贸易的影响。研究发现，由于冬小麦减产和粮食贸易网络碎片化，低收入和中等收入国家受到的影响尤为严重，并且地处冲突地区较远的国家所遭受的粮食供应中断比邻近国家更为显著。该研究使用了遥感技术中的卫星数据来估算小麦、大麦和燕麦的产量减少，并分析了自2022年2月24日以来实施的出口禁令政策的影响。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是利用卫星观测进行作物估产和粮食安全评估。
topic_words: ['Satellite imagery', 'Remote sensing', 'Crop yield', 'Wheat', 'Barley', 'Oats', 'Food security', 'Global food trade', 'Network analysis']
authors: Nan Jia;Zilong Xia;Yinshuai Li;Xiang Yu;Xutong Wu;Yingjie Li;Rongfei Su;Mengting Wang;Ruishan Chen;Jianguo Liu
title: The Russia-Ukraine war reduced food production and exports with a disparate geographical impact worldwide
abstract:
Lower- and middle-income countries are disproportionately impacted by the reduction of winter cereals yields and fragmentation of the food trade due to the Russia-Ukraine war, according to an analysis that uses satellite cropland data, meteorological and trade data, and network approach. 
 The transboundary impacts of regional war on global food trade remain underexplored, particularly regarding disruptions to production and trade networks. Here we address this gap by developing a rapid assessment framework that integrates remote sensing, policy monitoring, and network analysis to evaluate the effects of the Russia-Ukraine war on global winter cereal production and trade. Using satellite data, we estimated yield reductions for wheat, barley, and oats and analyzed the effects of export-ban policies enacted since February 24, 2022. Our findings indicate that lower- and middle-income countries were disproportionately impacted, as trade networks became fragmented, forming isolated clusters that threatened food accessibility. Geographically distant countries experienced greater disruptions than those near the conflict. This framework provides insights into the cascading effects of conflict on global food systems and offers a predictive tool for policymakers to address food availability challenges during future crises. Lower- and middle-income countries are disproportionately impacted by the reduction of winter cereals yields and fragmentation of the food trade due to the Russia-Ukraine war, according to an analysis that uses satellite cropland data, meteorological and trade data, and network approach.

explanation: 这篇研究论文探讨了1994年末印度洋偶极子事件如何通过刚果河径流增强1995年本格拉尼诺事件。文章分析了海洋、大气和水文数据，揭示了印度洋偶极子、刚果河流域降雨量异常增加、刚果河径流量增大、刚果河口附近低盐度水以及这种低盐度水向南平流进入本格拉上升流区域之间的顺序联系。低盐度水阻止了表层混合层与温跃层的垂直混合，导致海表温度升高。该研究使用了卫星遥感技术观测海表温度、大气环流和洋流变化，并结合其他数据分析气候变率和天气模式。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是海表温度、大气环流和水汽含量的卫星观测，以及这些数据在气候研究和预测中的应用。
topic_words: ['sea surface temperature', 'atmospheric circulation', 'ocean salinity', 'satellite remote sensing', 'weather patterns', 'climate variability', 'Indian Ocean Dipole', 'Benguela Niño']
authors: Michael J. McPhaden;Sreelekha Jarugula;Léo C. Aroucha;Joke F. Lübbecke
title: Indian Ocean Dipole intensifies Benguela Niño through Congo River discharge
abstract:
The 1995 Benguela Niño, the strongest in the past 40 years, was intensified by high freshwater discharge from the Congo River due to a major Indian Ocean Dipole in late 1994, according to analysis of oceanic, atmospheric and hydrological data. 
 Benguela Niños are episodes of unusual El Niño-like warming in the upwelling zone off the coast of southwest Africa, with consequential impacts on marine ecosystems, coastal fisheries and regional weather. The strongest Benguela Niño in the past 40 years occurred in February–April 1995 with local sea surface temperature anomalies up to 4 °C off the coast of Angola and Namibia. Here, we show that a strong Indian Ocean Dipole in September–November 1994 helped boost the amplitude of the 1995 Benguela Niño through a land bridge involving Congo River discharge. We use atmospheric, oceanic, and hydrological data to demonstrate the sequential linkage between Indian Ocean Dipole development, unusually high rainfall in the Congo River basin, high Congo River discharge, low salinity near the Congo River mouth, and southward advection of this low salinity water into the Benguela upwelling region. The low salinity water isolated the surface mixed layer from the thermocline, which limited vertical mixing with colder subsurface waters and led to enhanced sea surface temperature warming. We also discuss how other Indian Ocean Dipole events may have similarly affected subsequent Benguela Niños and the possibility that Indian Ocean Dipole impacts on Benguela Niños may become more prominent in the future. The 1995 Benguela Niño, the strongest in the past 40 years, was intensified by high freshwater discharge from the Congo River due to a major Indian Ocean Dipole in late 1994, according to analysis of oceanic, atmospheric and hydrological data.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了上海中心大厦不同高度的氨气浓度和氮同位素组成，以及其对2020年中国新冠疫情封锁期间排放量减少的响应。研究利用了世界最高的城市地区原位研究平台——上海中心大厦（632米）上的观测数据。结果表明，氨气浓度和氮同位素组成在各个高度都对封锁措施高度敏感，并且氮同位素的变化与封锁相关的燃烧排放减少相符。尽管氨气来源在垂直方向上没有太大变化，但氨气浓度从地面到混合层顶部（约570米）持续增加。化学传输模型模拟和辅助现场测量数据支持了这一发现，表明城市氨气排放的垂直输送是影响氨气浓度和氮同位素组成垂直分布的重要因素。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及大气成分分析（氨气及其同位素）、空气质量监测（城市氨气污染）以及对污染物垂直分布的观测。
topic_words: ['Atmospheric composition', 'Ammonia (NH3)', 'Nitrogen isotopes', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Vertical profiling', 'Urban pollution', 'Emission reduction']
authors: Yunhua Chang;Lin Cheng;Haifeng Yu;Jianlin Hu
title: Concentration and Isotopic Composition of Atmospheric Ammonia Throughout the Urban Mixing Layer in Response to Extreme Emission Reduction
abstract: Here, we investigate the vertical distribution of ammonia (NH3) and its nitrogen isotopic composition (δ15N-NH3) at nine heights along the Shanghai Tower (632 m a.g.l.), the world’s highest in situ research platform in urban areas that we recently established. Both the NH3 levels and δ15N-NH3 values, at all heights, were highly responsive to China’s COVID-19 shutdown, and N isotopic shifts were consistent with the shutdown-associated reduction of combustion-related NH3 emissions in early 2020. Despite the fact that the NH3 source partitioning did not greatly change along the vertical transect, we observed that the abundance of NH3 continuously increased from the ground to the upper mixing layer (∼570 m). Supported by chemical transport-model simulations and auxiliary field measurements, our data indicate that vertical transport of urban NH3 emissions represents an important modulating control with regards to the observed vertical pattern of NH3 concentrations and δ15N-NH3.

explanation: 这篇论文研究使用物理信息神经网络（PINN）模拟全新世和末次盛冰期全球地表尘埃沉积。它利用古气候测量数据和自然尘埃值训练PINN模型，重建全球尘埃沉积通量图。与传统的克里金插值法相比，PINN方法通过结合物理原理（如对流扩散方程，防止尘埃逆风流动）来改进空间插值，从而生成更符合物理规律的重建结果。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及大气成分分析（气溶胶，特别是尘埃），并利用空间插值技术处理来自卫星观测或地面观测的稀疏数据，以获得全球尺度的尘埃沉积通量信息，这对于空气质量监测和古气候研究都具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['Atmospheric dust', 'Aerosol', 'Paleoclimate', 'Global dust deposition', 'Satellite remote sensing', 'Air quality', 'Spatial interpolation', 'Advection-diffusion equation', 'Holocene', 'Last Glacial Maximum']
authors: Constanza A. Molina Catricheo;Fabrice Lambert;Julien Salomon;Elwin van ’t Wout
title: Modeling global surface dust deposition using physics-informed neural networks
abstract:
Physics-Informed Neural Networks trained with natural dust values and paleoclimatic measurements can reconstruct the global dust deposition during the Holocene and Last Glacial Maximum, complementing traditional kriging reconstruction methods. 
 Paleoclimatic measurements serve to understand Earth System processes and evaluate climate model performances. However, their spatial coverage is generally sparse and unevenly distributed across the globe. Statistical interpolation methods are the prevalent techniques to grid such data, but these purely data-driven approaches sometimes produce results that are incoherent with our knowledge of the physical world. Physics-Informed Neural Networks follow an innovative approach to data analysis and physical modeling through machine learning, as they incorporate physical principles into the data-driven learning process. Here, we develop a machine-learning algorithm to reconstruct global maps of atmospheric dust surface deposition fluxes from paleoclimatic archives for the Holocene and Last Glacial Maximum periods. We design an advection-diffusion equation that prevents dust particles from flowing upwind. Our physics-informed neural network improves on kriging interpolation by allowing variable asymmetry around data points. The reconstructions display realistic dust plumes from continental sources towards ocean basins following prevailing winds. Physics-Informed Neural Networks trained with natural dust values and paleoclimatic measurements can reconstruct the global dust deposition during the Holocene and Last Glacial Maximum, complementing traditional kriging reconstruction methods.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了对流层和平流层之间由罗斯贝波破碎引起的垂直臭氧输送的减弱趋势及其对近地面臭氧浓度的影响。研究发现，2000年后，与2000年前相比，反气旋波破碎的频率和对流层上部和平流层下部的臭氧浓度呈现反相关关系，这表明对流层和平流层之间的臭氧垂直输送减弱。此外，对流层顶的持续抬升也增加了平流层臭氧向下输送的距离，阻碍了平流层臭氧向近地面的输送。研究使用了ERA5再分析数据，这是一种基于卫星观测和其他大气数据进行分析的数据集，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。研究结果对于评估未来由于平流层臭氧入侵而造成的臭氧污染的潜在社会和经济影响具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['ozone', 'troposphere', 'stratosphere', 'vertical transport', 'Rossby wave breaking', 'satellite observation', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'ERA5 reanalysis data']
authors: Ying Wang;Yang He;Zheng Sheng;Jing Sun;Zilin Qin;Yaqin Tao
title: Vertical ozone transport by Rossby wave breaking in upper troposphere-lower stratosphere is weakening
abstract:
•There is a strong anti-correlation between AWB and ozone concentrations in the LS and UT before and after 2000, respectively. •The vertical transport of ozone in UTLS is attenuated by reduced AWB events. •High amounts of stratospheric ozone will be more difficult to sink to the near-surface given the persistent increase of the tropopause. 
 Ozone is a crucial greenhouse gas, ranking third only to carbon dioxide and methane, and it regulates the environment and climate change. Researchers' interest in stratosphere-troposphere exchange (STE) has grown recently, and the increase in tropospheric ozone due to STE processes is particularly important, leading to the excess ozone having a detrimental impact on both population health and the local climate. A major factor driving vertical ozone transport is the re-distribution of vertical momentum resulting from Anticyclonic Wave Breaking (AWB) in the Upper Troposphere Lower Stratosphere (UTLS). However, how the interannual trends of AWB frequency can influence the ozone vertical distribution, and what the interaction mechanism between the two in UTLS are still open questions. Focusing on the Northeast Asia region, where has the greatest influence on near-surface high ozone concentrations in Eastern China, a composite analysis is performed using the ERA5 reanalysis data to discuss the effect of AWB on ozone distribution and its changing trend. The result reveals that, after 2000, AWB frequency (UTLS ozone portion) shows an inter-annual decreasing (increasing) trend. Both are opposite to their inter-annual trends before 2000. i.e. AWB frequency (UTLS ozone portion) shows increasing (decreasing) from 1979 to 2000. Strong anti-correlation of AWB frequency and UTLS ozone portion appears in the upper-troposphere (UT) and lower-stratosphere (LS) before and after 2000, respectively. This phenomenon could be related to the ozone vertical transport weakening caused by declining AWB frequency trends. Additionally, the observed sustained elevation of the tropopause also increases the downward transport distance of stratospheric ozone. The transport of stratospheric ozone to the near-surface seems impeded. Considering the crucial effects of STE on ozone pollution episodes, the long-term changes for the ozone portion in UTLS caused by AWB deserve further study, which can help assess future ozone's potential social and economic effects due to stratospheric intrusion.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了中国淄博市挥发性有机物（VOCs）的光化学消耗及其对臭氧（O3）形成的影响。研究发现，光化学消耗的VOCs（C-VOCs）占初始VOCs的比例较高，尤其是在臭氧浓度高的时候。烯烃类VOCs是C-VOCs的主要成分，对臭氧生成潜势（OFP）贡献最大。研究通过多种方法评估了C-VOCs对臭氧生成的影响，结果表明，如果不考虑C-VOCs，会低估NOx限制臭氧生成的比例。研究还建议，要有效降低臭氧浓度，需要采取降低VOCs和NOx的综合策略。总的来说，这项研究强调了在制定臭氧减排策略时考虑光化学消耗VOCs的重要性，这与大气环境遥感技术，特别是空气质量监测和大气成分分析密切相关，因为准确的VOCs和O3浓度数据通常依赖于地面监测和卫星遥感技术。
topic_words: ['Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs)', 'Ozone (O3)', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Photochemical Reactions', 'Atmospheric Composition', 'Emission Reduction']
authors: Binqian Fan;Wenting Wang;Chunmei Geng;Bo Xu;Zhenze Song;Yingying Liu;Wen Yang
title: Composition of photochemical consumed volatile organic compounds and their impact on ozone formation regime: A case study in Zibo, China
abstract:
•C-VOCs composition and their impacts on O3formation were assessed. •During high-O3periods, mean C-VOCs concentration was 5.8±8.3 ppbv, 9.5% of In-VOCs. •Alkenes (including isoprene) dominated C-VOCs (84.6%) and C-OFP (91.0%). •The O3formation shifted to the NOx-limited regime after considering C-VOCs. 
 The transport of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) to the measurement site leads to significant photochemical consumption, directly impacting ozone (O3) formation. To address this issue, a comprehensive observation campaign was conducted from May 1 to September 30, 2021, in Zibo, China. Using the Framework for 0-D Atmospheric Modeling (F0AM), the impact of photochemical consumed VOCs (C-VOCs) on O3 sensitivity was evaluated based on initial VOCs (In-VOCs). The results indicate that the average concentration of C-VOCs was 5.8 ± 8.3 ppbv, accounting for 9.5% of the In-VOCs concentration during high-O3 periods, which was higher than that during low-O3 periods. Alkenes (including isoprene) contributed 84.6% to the C-VOCs and accounted for 91.0% of the C-OFP (ozone formation potential (OFP) of C-VOCs), followed by aromatics. Isoprene, 1,3-butadiene, m/p-xylene, 1-butene, and propylene were identified as key species contributing to C-OFP. Three methods assessed the impact of including or excluding C-VOCs on O3 formation. Based on the VOCs/NOx indicator, the proportion of the NOₓ-limited regime was underestimated by 14%∼21% for the high-O3 periods and 18%∼21% for the low-O3 periods without considering C-VOCs. Compared to the results of the measured VOCs (M-VOCs), the relative incremental reactivity (RIR) value of NOx increased significantly for both high and low-O3 periods when considering C-VOCs, while the RIR value of anthropogenic volatile organic compounds (AVOC) showed a reverse trend. The RIR(NOx)/RIR(AVOC) results indicated that the O3 formation regime shifted from VOC-limited or transitional to NOx-limited, which is consistent with the result from the empirical kinetic modeling approach (EKMA). Emission reduction modeling suggested reducing AVOC and NOx at a 1:3 ratio as an effective O3 mitigation strategy. This work reveals that the NOx limitation in controlling O3 generation in this region will be underestimated without considering C-VOCs, emphasizing the importance of C-VOCs in the formulation of O3 reduction strategies.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用全球降水测量计划（GPM）卫星数据监测台风降水的有效性。具体来说，文章利用GPM的双频降水雷达（DPR）和微波成像仪（GMI）数据分析了2015年台风“彩虹”的降水率和潜热垂直分布特征，并基于高密度地面雨量站观测数据评估了GPM多卫星综合反演产品（IMERG）的性能。研究结果表明，DPR数据能够有效监测台风降水，IMERG产品能够捕捉台风降水的时空演变，但在低降水率估计过高，高降水率估计过低，且区域降水总量存在高估现象。此外，研究还发现增加雨量站密度可以提高卫星产品精度评估的可靠性。总而言之，本研究关注的是利用卫星遥感技术监测台风降水，属于大气环境遥感技术范畴，与大气水汽和降水等大气成分分析密切相关。
topic_words: ['precipitation', 'typhoon', 'satellite remote sensing', 'GPM', 'IMERG', 'DPR', 'GMI', 'rain gauge', 'latent heat', 'atmospheric water vapor']
authors: Xue Li;Lingfang Chen;Yangbo Chen;Ruihao Zhang;Zhihua Zhu;Hui Yin;Baolin Jiang
title: Assessing the use of GPM DPR and IMERG products for Typhoon Mujigae over the southern coastal provinces of China
abstract:
•Analyzed vertical profiles of precipitation and latent heat in Typhoon Mujigae using 2 A-DPR, showing post-landfall changes. •Increased rain gauge density improves evaluation accuracy, reduces local outliers and enhances evaluation robustness. •Studied spatiotemporal precipitation patterns in Typhoon Mujigae, focusing on intensity changes and spatial variability. 
 Typhoons are significant weather phenomena in China, often resulting in floods, inland waterlogging, and significant losses of life and property. Satellite remote sensing techniques provide valuable data on the cloud and precipitation structures of typhoons, as well as their temporal and spatial rainfall distributions. However, there is a notable lack of comprehensive evaluation studies assessing the effectiveness of the new generation Global Precipitation Measurement (GPM) Level-2 and Level-3 products in monitoring typhoons. In this study, GPM satellite multifrequency microwave imager (GMI) and dual-frequency precipitation radar (DPR) data were utilized to analyze the precipitation rate and latent heat vertical distribution characteristics of Typhoon Mujigae (No. 1522), which occurred in 2015. Additionally, the performance of the GPM IMERG (Integrated Multi-satellitE Retrievals for GPM) product (V06) was evaluated based on high-density station precipitation observations. The analysis shows that 2 A-DPR data are valuable for typhoon precipitation monitoring, revealing significant heterogeneity in precipitation rates and latent heat release within typhoons. GPM products capture spatiotemporal rainfall evolution but overestimate low rates and underestimate high rates, with IMERG Final Run notably overestimating regional rainfall. IMERG products show moderate correlation (R: 0.44–0.47) and errors (RMSE: 2.21–2.47 mm/h). Early Run and Late Run products are preferred for their shorter latency and higher accuracy. Evaluations based on dense rain gauge data indicate that increasing the number of stations can help reduce errors and local anomalies, thereby improving the reliability of satellite accuracy assessments.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了热带气旋快速增强所需的临近大气热力学条件。虽然高海表温度和低对流层风切变是众所周知的促进风暴增强的环境因素，但它们不足以预测增强，特别是快速增强。研究使用探空仪在预风暴和风暴环境中收集数据，通过三维变分分析将其内插到规则网格上。结果表明，在中尺度对流系统中，一个衡量大气对湿对流稳定性的不稳定性指数和一个衡量大气湿度含量的饱和分数，显示出有利于增强，特别是快速增强的狭窄值域。 这项研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用探空仪观测（类似于卫星遥感获取大气数据）来分析大气温度、湿度和稳定性等参数，这些参数与热带气旋的快速增强密切相关。
topic_words: ['Atmospheric temperature', 'Atmospheric moisture', 'Atmospheric stability', 'Dropsondes', 'Satellite observations', 'Tropical cyclone', 'Rapid intensification']
authors: Stipo Sentić;Željka Stone;David J. Raymond
title: Tropospheric Thermodynamic Conditions Necessary for Tropical Cyclone Rapid Intensification
abstract: As a part of the Tropical Cyclone Rapid Intensification (TCRI) project, we investigated thermodynamic conditions necessary for cyclone intensification. While high sea surface temperature and low tropospheric wind shear are well known environmental factors contributing to storm intensification, they are not sufficient to predict intensification and rapid intensification in particular. To explore thermodynamic factors contributing to intensification, we used dropsondes deployed in pre‐storm and storm environments interpolated on a regular grid via a 3D variational analysis. We find that in mesoscale convective areas an instability index, which measures the stability of the atmosphere to moist convection, and saturation fraction, which measures the moisture content of the atmosphere, show a narrow range of values favorable for intensification, and rapid intensification in particular.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注孟加拉湾热带气旋对华南地区降水的影响。它分析了1979年至2021年期间发生的28次热带气旋远程降水事件，利用客观分类方法识别出三种有利于远程降水发生的典型天气形势。研究使用了气象观测数据，例如降水量、气压、风场等，来分析热带气旋的路径、强度以及与华南地区降水之间的关系。虽然文章没有直接提及具体的遥感技术，如卫星传感器类型，但其研究内容与大气环境遥感密切相关，因为对降水的观测和分析往往依赖于气象卫星等遥感手段获取的大范围数据。研究结果对于改进华南地区的天气预报，特别是对热带气旋引起的远程降水预报具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['water vapor', 'precipitation', 'tropical cyclone', 'satellite rainfall estimation', 'weather forecasting', 'atmospheric moisture transport', 'South China rainfall']
authors: Xiaoting Fan;Ying Li;Na Wei;Pengchao An;Beiyao Liu
title: Remote Precipitation Events Over South China Related to the Bay of Bengal Tropical Cyclones During the Pre‐Summer Rainy Season
abstract: Tropical cyclones (TCs) originating in the Bay of Bengal (BOB) can induce heavy rainfall in remote South China, primarily due to the abundant tropical moisture transporting from the vicinity of BOB TCs. This study analyzes 28 TC remote precipitation (TRP) events occurring over South China during the pre‐summer rainy season (April to June) from 1979 to 2021, from a synoptic climatology perspective. On average, TRP events persisted for about 3 days, with primary precipitation centers identified in northeastern Guangxi Province, central and coastal areas of Guangdong Province, and the region from western Fujian to central Jiangxi, resulting in above‐normal rainfall intensity in northern South China. Employing the objective classification method of the self‐organizing map, we identified three key configurations conducive to TRP occurrence, including synoptic patterns dominated by BOB TCs in conjunction with the southern branch trough (P1), the western Pacific subtropical high (WPSH, P2), or the prevailing southwest monsoon (P3). P1 and P2 exhibited three precipitation centers similar to those in the overall TRP events, while P3 corresponded to weaker precipitation due to less pronounced frontogenesis, with its center located in the southern warm‐sector region of South China. Additionally, the stronger and more northerly WPSH in P2 caused a northward shift in the water vapor flux reaching South China compared to P1, enhancing the precipitation in northern South China. This study extends the perspective of TRP events in subtropical regions, holding significant implications for weather forecasts in downstream regions affected by BOB TCs.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了热带气旋快速增强过程中涡旋高度的动态演变。它利用涡旋动态高度 (DHOV) 这一指标来量化热带气旋整个生命周期中的垂直结构，该指标对切向风场随高度衰减率敏感。研究发现，在快速增强之前，观测到的风暴总是具有较高的 DHOV 值。通过分析垂直对齐和倾斜的热带气旋，以及数值模拟结果，论文揭示了 DHOV 值与热带气旋强度之间的关系，以及垂直风切变对 DHOV 和强度变化的影响。尤其指出高层大气急流对热带气旋发展的影响，以及对流层顶附近增温的重要性。 这项研究需要利用卫星观测数据以及数值模拟结果，对大气风场、温度等大气成分进行分析，因此与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['tropical cyclone', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric wind field', 'temperature', 'rapid intensification', 'vertical wind shear']
authors: Alexander J. DesRosiers;Michael M. Bell
title: Dynamic Vortex Height Evolution During Tropical Cyclone Rapid Intensification
abstract: The vertical structure of the tropical cyclone (TC) vortex can be quantified throughout the TC life cycle via the dynamic height of the vortex (DHOV) metric, which is sensitive to the rate of decay of the tangential wind field with height. Observed storms always possessed a high DHOV value prior to periods of rapid intensification (RI). When limited to vertically‐aligned TCs where the low‐ to mid‐level vortex tilt magnitude is small, all DHOV values are found to be large enough for RI. Vortex tilt results from environmental vertical wind shear (VWS) and a similar relationship is found in an ensemble of TCs simulated in a moderate shear environment. Once vortex tilt decreases, both the observed and ensemble TCs exhibit a concurrent increase of DHOV and intensity, indicating the metric provides useful information about changing vertical structure in both tilted and aligned TCs. The growth of DHOV during RI is closely coupled with a strengthening warm core at the upper levels. A simulation with an upper‐level jet of VWS is used to better understand the importance of the upper levels during RI by disrupting vortex development there. DHOV and intensity of the TC are effectively capped in the jet simulation relative to its counterpart in a control simulation, indicating shear can limit TC height without appreciable low‐ to mid‐level tilt. Differences in kinematic and thermal structure between the jet and control runs are found from 12‐ to 16‐km altitude, suggesting the importance of warming near the tropopause in powerful TCs.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了1950年至2019年间全球海洋降水特征的变化趋势。它利用船载天气报告数据，对不同类型的海洋降水（毛毛雨、中等强度降水、强降水、雷暴降水和冻雨）的相对频率进行了分析，并绘制了其在不同区域和季节的分布图。研究结果显示，在过去70年中，全球不同区域的海洋降水类型和频率都发生了显著变化，例如热带地区毛毛雨的频率增加，而亚热带和高纬度地区则减少；北太平洋和地中海地区强降水的比例增加；大西洋上空雷暴的频率下降，但在地中海和西大西洋则上升；北半球冻雨的区域则向极地收缩。这些变化趋势与气候变化模型预测的结果相符。虽然研究主要使用了船载观测数据，但论文也提到这些结果与卫星观测和沿海地面站的数据一致，表明研究结果具有可靠性。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术，特别是卫星观测和气候变化研究密切相关。
topic_words: ['precipitation', 'oceanic precipitation', 'satellite observations', 'climate change', 'shipboard present-weather reports', 'global climatology', 'long-term trends']
authors: Harrison Tran;Grant W. Petty
title: Trends in Oceanic Precipitation Characteristics Inferred From Shipboard Present‐Weather Reports, 1950–2019
abstract: Shipboard present‐weather reports from 1950 to 2019 are aggregated and composited yearly and seasonally on a 1°×1° $1{}^{\circ}\times 1{}^{\circ}$ grid to characterize the global climatology and apparent long‐term trends in the relative frequency of four categories of oceanic precipitation: drizzle, moderate, and heavy non‐drizzle, precipitation associated with thunderstorms and deep convection, and frozen‐phase precipitation. Although ship reports are susceptible to subjective interpretation, the inferred distributions of these phenomena are consistent with observations from other platforms such as satellites and coastal surface stations. These distributions highlight widespread 70‐year trends that are often consistent across both annual and seasonal frequencies, with statistical significance at 95% confidence. The relative frequency of ship‐reported drizzle has largely increased in the tropics annually and seasonally, with linear best‐fit relative increases by as much as 15% per decade. Decreased relative frequencies have been observed in parts of the subtropics and at higher latitudes. Heavier precipitation has encompassed a growing fraction of non‐drizzle precipitation reports over the subtropical North Pacific and Mediterranean. The relative frequency of thunderstorm reports has declined over the open Atlantic but show positive trends over the Mediterranean and the western Atlantic. The trends in relative frozen precipitation occurrence suggest a poleward retreat of areas receiving frozen precipitation in the Northern Hemisphere. Possible mechanisms for these ship‐observed trends are discussed and placed in the context of the modeled effects of climate change on global precipitation.

explanation: 这篇论文的标题和摘要表明其研究内容与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。ENSO（厄尔尼诺-南方涛动）是热带太平洋海温异常变化的一种气候现象，它会影响全球大气环流和气候模式。论文研究的是风的变化如何增强ENSO，这与大气环流密切相关。要研究ENSO，需要用到多种遥感技术，例如卫星观测海表温度（SST）的变化，以及通过卫星或地面观测来监测风的变化。因此，该研究很可能利用了大气环境遥感技术，例如气象卫星观测和大气成分分析来研究ENSO现象及其与风的相互作用。
topic_words: ['ENSO', 'wind', 'atmospheric circulation', 'satellite remote sensing', 'sea surface temperature', 'climate monitoring']
authors: Bronwyn Wake
title: Wind changes enhance ENSO
abstract: Wind changes enhance ENSO

journal: International Journal of Applied Earth Observation and Geoinformation
explanation: 这篇论文研究了利用SDGSAT-1卫星的高分辨率热红外影像数据，在巴基斯坦卡拉奇这座干旱特大城市中评估与热相关的健康风险。研究采用Crichton风险三角模型框架，结合危险、暴露和脆弱性因素，在人口普查区层面绘制了热健康风险图。结果显示，市中心南部地区是高温热点区域，LCZ 2, 3, 6和7被认定为高风险区域。研究还分析了电力设施、浴室设施和住房密度等因素对热脆弱性的影响，并提出在高风险区域增加绿地和改善基础设施的建议，以减轻热应激。总的来说，本研究利用遥感技术，特别是热红外遥感，对城市热环境和健康风险进行了精细化的评估，为城市规划和防暑降温措施的制定提供了科学依据。
topic_words: ['Land surface temperature', 'Thermal infrared imagery', 'Satellite observation', 'SDGSAT-1', 'Heat risk assessment', 'Urban heat island']
authors: Muhammad Fahad Baqa;Linlin Lu;Huadong Guo;Xiaoning Song;Seyed Kazem Alavipanah;Syed Nawaz-ul-Huda;Qingting Li;Fang Chen
title: Investigating heat-related health risks related to local climate zones using SDGSAT-1 high-resolution thermal infrared imagery in an arid megacity
abstract:
•Heat health risk index(HHRI) was first mapped at census tract level in Karachi. •Hotspots were mainly distributed in downtown district South. •LCZs 2, 3, 6 and 7 were designated as high-risk areas. •Green spaces in LCZ 2 and 3 and improved infrastructure in LCZ 7 were suggested. 
 Due to the compounding impacts of urbanization and climate change-induced warming, urban inhabitants face increasing risks of thermal health issues. The use of high-resolution maps that categorize intra-urban thermal environment and Local Climate Zones (LCZ) could enhance the understanding of the correlation between heat-related health risks and microclimates. In this study, a fine-scale heat risk assessment framework was applied in an arid megacity, Karachi, Pakistan. Following Crichton’s Risk Triangle framework, heat health risks were mapped by considering hazard-exposure-vulnerability components at the census ward level. The heat hazard was mapped using SDGSAT-1 thermal infrared data at a 30 m spatial resolution during summer season. Factors contributing most to heat vulnerability were identified as the availability of electricity facilities, bathroom facilities, and housing density, with contribution rates of 47.51 %, 21.86 %, and 8.07 %, respectively. Heat risks were considerably higher for built types (0.16) compared to natural LCZ types (0.07), with 65 % of LCZ 2, 3, 6, and 7 (compact mid-rise, compact low-rise, open low-rise, and lightweight low-rise areas) identified as high-risk areas. To mitigate heat risks, green space should be planned in LCZ2 and LCZ3 characterized by dense population and compact buildings arrangement, and public cooling facilities and infrastructure should be improved in LCZ7 featured with squatter and slum settlements. Urban planners may consider restricting the growth of these areas in newly-developed regions, including encroachments and unplanned settlements, to prevent further exacerbation of heat stress. This study offers a valuable guide for assessing and alleviating heat risks at the community level, thereby promoting the development of heat resilient urban areas.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了印度高海拔地区亚微米气溶胶的挥发性，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。研究使用了热解吸附-高分辨率飞行时间气溶胶质谱仪 (HR-TOF AMS) 等技术分析气溶胶的组成和挥发特性。研究结果表明，不同组分气溶胶的挥发性差异很大，其中硫酸盐挥发性最低，硝酸盐和铵盐挥发性最高，有机气溶胶的挥发性居中。通过正矩阵分解 (PMF) 分析，论文识别出四种有机气溶胶组分，并分析了它们各自的挥发性和贡献。研究发现，半挥发性含氧化有机气溶胶 (SV-OOA) 的挥发性高于预期，这可能与它对其他气溶胶的包覆作用有关。这些发现有助于深入理解高海拔地区大气气溶胶的物理化学特性及其对气候和环境的影响，例如通过对气溶胶组成和挥发性的分析，可以更好地理解其对云凝结核活化特性的影响，这与卫星遥感观测到的气溶胶光学特性密切相关。
topic_words: ['Aerosol', 'Volatility', 'Organic matter', 'Air quality', 'Thermal-optical analysis', 'Mass spectrometry', 'Atmospheric composition', 'India']
authors: Subrata Mukherjee;Rohit D. Patil;M.Y. Aslam;G.S. Meena;V. Anil Kumar;Sachin S. Patil;Anoop S. Mahajan;Liselotte Tinel;Vinayak V. Waghamare;G. Pandithurai
title: Aerosol volatility over a high-altitude site in India: Effect of semi-volatile organics
abstract:
•Sub-micron aerosol volatility was extensively studied at high-altitude site, India. •Sulfate exhibited minimum volatility (26 %) among all the sub-micron constituents. •SV-OOA was highest contributor to total OA in ambient aerosol. •Highest volatility of SV-OOA among all organics components. •The higher volatility of oxygenated hydrocarbon further indicated possible coating. 
 Sub-micron aerosols primarily comprise of organics, sulfate, nitrate, ammonium, and chloride. Of these, organics have high complexity in their chemical and physical characteristics. In this study, aerosol volatility of non-refractory sub-micron aerosol was studied using a thermal denuder (at a constant temperature of 150 °C) coupled High-Resolution Time of flight Aerosol Mass Spectrometer (HR-TOF AMS) for the period from 6th to 26th February 2021. Nitrate and ammonium had the highest volatility (80 % and 68 %, respectively), followed by organics (54 %). The lowest volatility rate was observed for sulfate (26 %) indicating the tendency of sulfate aerosols to be more in the particle phase at higher temperatures. The volatility for organics decreases during afternoon and midnight hours due to the prevalence of secondary organic aerosol. Further positive matrix factorization (PMF) analysis on both the denuded and ambient organics aerosol revealed four factors, namely, hydrocarbon-like organic aerosols (HOA), biomass-burning organic aerosol (BBOA), semi-volatile oxygenated organic aerosol (SV-OOA), and low-volatile oxygenated organic aerosol (LV-OOA). Over the campaign, LV-OOA showed an increase in fractional contribution from 31 % to 56 % of total organics. SV-OOA, HOA, and BBOA showed decreasing trends, as they have higher volatility than LV-OOA. Surprisingly, SV-OOA exhibited higher volatility than that of HOA, and BBOA. Further, the volatility of oxygenated hydrocarbon peaks was compared with hydrocarbon peaks to assess the higher volatility of SV-OOA aerosols, and the oxygenated hydrocarbons were estimated to be more volatile than hydrocarbons. The present study highlighted the possible coating of SV-OOA over the existing aerosols which may modulate the aerosol to cloud condensation nuclei (CCN) activation characteristics.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了近几十年来全球陆地表面昼夜温差(DTR)的变化趋势。利用集合经验模态分解(EEMD)方法分析了1961年至2022年全球DTR的时空特征和长期趋势。结果表明，全球平均DTR在1988年前后发生了反转，由下降转为上升，影响了全球47%的陆地面积。这种变化在温带地区最为显著，春季和夏季的反转也较早出现。研究发现，由于云量减少导致地表太阳辐射增加，最高气温(Tmax)的升温速度快于最低气温(Tmin)，从而导致DTR的反转和增强。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用了卫星观测数据（虽然文中没有明确说明使用了哪种具体的卫星或传感器）来分析地表温度，并探讨了气候变化对地表温度的影响。研究结果对于制定有针对性的气候政策和适应战略具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['surface temperature', 'diurnal temperature range', 'satellite remote sensing', 'climate change', 'land surface temperature', 'Tmax', 'Tmin', 'cloud cover', 'radiation']
authors: Ge Liu;Yan Guo;Haoming Xia;Xingya Liu;Hongquan Song;Jia Yang;Yuqing Zhang
title: Increase Asymmetric Warming Rates Between Daytime and Nighttime Temperatures Over Global Land During Recent Decades
abstract: Diurnal asymmetric warming, a critical feature of climate change, significantly impacts water‐carbon exchange in terrestrial ecosystems. This study analyzes the spatiotemporal characteristics and long‐term trends of the global diurnal temperature range (DTR) from 1961 to 2022 using ensemble empirical mode decomposition (EEMD). Our results reveal a trend reversal in global averaged DTR around 1988, shifting from a decrease to an increase, affecting 47% of global land areas. Subsequent to the reversal, the most pronounced increases were observed in temperate regions. Seasonal analysis shows earlier reversals in spring and summer, with accelerated change rates following the reversal. Additionally, increased surface solar radiation from reduced cloud cover caused daily maximum (Tmax) temperatures to warm faster than the minimum (Tmin), leading to a reversal and intensified DTR. These complex patterns underscore the need for targeted climate policies and adaptation strategies to tackle global warming.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了电离层顶部的O+离子扩散通量及其在冬季夜间电离层电子密度增强（WNE）中的作用。研究利用COSMIC卫星的无线电掩星数据，推导了全球电离层顶部的O+离子扩散通量，并分析了其在不同经纬度和不同时间的分布特征。结果表明，冬季半球的O+离子通量在夜间持续向下，并在特定经纬度和时间达到峰值，与WNE的分布特征相似。进一步地，研究将推导出的通量作为上边界条件，应用于热层电离层电动力学全球环流模型（TIEGCM）进行模拟，模拟结果与观测结果一致，证实了电离层顶部的等离子体向下扩散是WNE的主要机制。总而言之，这项研究利用卫星遥感技术（无线电掩星）观测和数值模拟，定量研究了电离层等离子体成分及其动态变化，与大气环境遥感密切相关。
topic_words: ['ionosphere', 'electron density', 'plasma', 'radio occultation', 'COSMIC satellite', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Quan‐Han Li;Yong‐Qiang Hao;Wenbin Wang;Shun‐Rong Zhang;Liying Qian;Ercha Aa;Dong‐He Zhang;Zuo Xiao;Maosheng He
title: Global Distribution of Ionospheric Topside Diffusive Flux and Midlatitude Electron Density Enhancement in Winter Nighttime
abstract: Ionospheric topside O+ ${O}^{+}$ diffusive flux is derived using Constellation Observing System for Meteorology, Ionosphere, and Climate (COSMIC) radio occultation data, to investigate its global distribution and also its role in winter nighttime enhancement (WNE) of electron density. The flux of the winter hemisphere maintains downward throughout the night. It is much larger between 30° $30{}^{\circ}$ and 50° $50{}^{\circ}$ geomagnetic latitudes and keeps increasing until 22:00–00:00 LT. It peaks at 60° $60{}^{\circ}$W and 60° $60{}^{\circ}$E–120° $120{}^{\circ}$E geographic longitudes during the December solstice, and at 180° $180{}^{\circ}$E during the June solstice. These features are similar to those of WNE in NmF2. Furthermore, the derived flux is applied as the upper boundary condition to run the Thermosphere Ionosphere Electrodynamics General Circulation Model (TIEGCM). The simulated spatial‐temporal variations of WNE are consistent with the observations. The results indicate that downward plasma diffusion from the plasmasphere is the major mechanism of WNE, and the simulation quantifies its contribution.

explanation: 这篇论文利用MAVEN卫星数据，研究了2022年12月26日至28日太阳风消失事件对火星夜侧电离层的影响。研究发现，在太阳风密度和压力极低的时期，火星夜侧电离层的等离子体密度显著增加。电子密度增加了约2.5倍，各种离子（NO+、O2+、CO2+、C+、N+、O+和OH+）的密度增加了10倍以上。这表明，低动态/磁压和相对较高的夜侧电离层压力导致电离层向上膨胀，增加了电离层密度。此外，日夜等离子体传输也可能是导致等离子体密度增加的因素。该研究结果为了解极端平静太阳风期间行星大气/电离层提供了新的见解。 这项研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它使用了卫星观测数据（MAVEN卫星）来分析火星大气成分（电离层离子密度和电子密度），并研究了空间天气事件对火星大气环境的影响。
topic_words: ['Ionospheric composition', 'electron density', 'ion density', 'Martian atmosphere', 'MAVEN satellite', 'Solar wind', 'Atmospheric pressure', 'Space weather']
authors: L. Ram;D. Rout;S. Sarkhel
title: Mars Nightside Ionospheric Response During the Disappearing Solar Wind Event: First Results
abstract: We investigated, for the first time, the impact of the disappearing solar wind (DSW) event [26–28 December 2022] on the deep nightside ionospheric species using MAVEN data sets. An enhanced plasma density has been observed in the Martian nightside ionosphere during extreme low solar wind density and pressure periods. At a given altitude, the electron density surged by ∼2.5 times, while for ions (NO+, O2+, CO2+, C+, N+, O+, and OH+), it enhanced by > 10 times, respectively, compared to their typical average quiet‐time periods. This investigation suggests that an upward ionospheric expansion likely took place in a direct consequence to the contrasting low dynamic/magnetic pressure and relatively higher nightside ionospheric pressure (by 1–2 orders) causing an increased ionospheric density. Moreover, the day‐to‐night plasma transport may also be a contributing factor to the increased plasma density. Thus, this study offers a new insight about planetary atmosphere/ionosphere during extreme quiescent solar wind periods.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了三种再分析产品（IMERG，MERRA-2和NLDAS-2）对降水相态（雨或雪）的估算能力。研究利用了一个名为MRoS的公民科学项目收集的大量地面观测数据（39680个观测值）对这三种产品进行了验证。结果表明，这三种产品在检测降雪方面表现相对较好，但在检测低于0℃的降雨和高于2℃的降雪方面表现较差。IMERG和MERRA-2对降雪的分类效果较好，而NLDAS-2则高估了降雨量。该研究强调了公民科学数据在改进再分析产品方面的价值，这对于提高天气预报和水文模拟的精度具有重要意义。研究中使用了卫星遥感技术（例如GPM任务的IMERG产品），这是一种大气环境遥感技术，与大气成分分析（特别是降水相态）密切相关。
topic_words: ['precipitation', 'snow', 'rain', 'satellite remote sensing', 'precipitation phase', 'IMERG', 'GPM', 'reanalysis products', 'weather forecasting', 'hydrology', 'citizen science']
authors: Guo Yu;Keith S. Jennings;Benjamin J. Hatchett;Anne W. Nolin;Nayoung Hur;Meghan Collins;Anne Heggli;Sonia Tonino;Monica M. Arienzo
title: Crowdsourced Data Reveal Shortcomings in Precipitation Phase Products for Rain and Snow Partitioning
abstract: Reanalysis products support our understanding of how the precipitation phase influences hydrology across scales. However, a lack of validation data hinders the evaluation of a reanalysis‐estimated precipitation phase. In this study, we used a novel dataset from the Mountain Rain or Snow (MRoS) citizen science project to compare 39,680 MRoS observations from January 2020 to July 2023 across the conterminous United States (CONUS) to assess three precipitation phase products. These products included the Global Precipitation Measurement (GPM) mission Integrated Multi‐satellitE Retrievals for GPM (IMERG), the Modern‐Era Retrospective Analysis for Research and Applications (MERRA‐2), and the North American Land Data Assimilation System (NLDAS‐2). The overall critical success indices for detecting rainfall (snowfall) for IMERG, MERRA‐2, and NLDAS‐2 were 0.51 (0.79), 0.49 (0.77), and 0.54 (0.53), respectively. These indices show that IMERG and MERRA‐2 reasonably classify snowfall, whereas NLDAS‐2 overestimates rainfall. All products performed poorly in detecting subfreezing rainfall and snowfall above 2°C. Therefore, crowdsourced data provides a unique validation source to improve the capabilities of reanalysis products.

explanation: 这篇论文研究的是海洋热浪（MHWs）与热带气旋快速增强（RI）之间的关系，以及如何利用这种关系改进热带气旋快速增强的预测。研究利用了1981年至2023年的热带气旋最佳路径数据和海表温度数据，识别出MHWs和RI同时或连续发生的热点区域。论文的核心方法是建立一个基于风暴和MHW特征的集成机器学习模型，以提高RI预测的准确性，降低误报率。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用了卫星观测的海表温度数据（SST）来分析海洋热浪，并用这些数据结合热带气旋信息来改进灾害预警。
topic_words: ['Sea Surface Temperature (SST)', 'Satellite observations', 'Tropical cyclone intensity', 'Marine heatwaves (MHWs)', 'Disaster risk reduction', 'Ensemble machine learning model']
authors: Soheil Radfar;Ehsan Foroumandi;Hamed Moftakhari;Hamid Moradkhani;Gregory R. Foltz;Alex Sen Gupta
title: Global Predictability of Marine Heatwave Induced Rapid Intensification of Tropical Cyclones
abstract: Prediction of the rapid intensification (RI) of tropical cyclones (TCs) is crucial for improving disaster preparedness against storm hazards. These events can cause extensive damage to coastal areas if occurring close to landfall. Available models struggle to provide accurate RI estimates due to the complexity of underlying physical mechanisms. This study provides new insights into the prediction of a subset of rapidly intensifying TCs influenced by prolonged ocean warming events known as marine heatwaves (MHWs). MHWs could provide sufficient energy to supercharge TCs. Preconditioning by MHW led to RI of recent destructive TCs, Otis (2023), Doksuri (2023), and Ian (2022), with economic losses exceeding $150 billion. Here, we analyze the TC best track and sea surface temperature data from 1981 to 2023 to identify hotspot regions for compound events, where MHWs and RI of tropical cyclones occur concurrently or in succession. Building upon this, we propose an ensemble machine learning model for RI forecasting based on storm and MHW characteristics. This approach is particularly valuable as RI forecast errors are typically largest in favorable environments, such as those created by MHWs. Our study offers insight into predicting MHW TCs, which have been shown to be stronger TCs with potentially higher destructive power. Here, we show that using MHW predictors instead of the conventional method of using sea surface temperature reduces the false alarm rate by 30%. Overall, our findings contribute to coastal hazard risk awareness amidst unprecedented climate warming causing more frequent MHWs.

explanation: 这篇论文研究了青藏高原地区民用燃料燃烧排放的含氮有机化合物（NOCs）及其在大气氧化过程中的环境影响。研究采用实验和理论相结合的方法，考察了不同燃料（畜粪和沥青煤）燃烧产生的NOCs的特性，以及羟基自由基（·OH）和硝酸根自由基（·NO3）对这些NOCs的光化学老化过程。结果表明，不同类型的NOCs对光化学老化的响应存在差异，这与它们的分子结构有关。部分NOCs的光吸收能力在氧化过程中会降低，而另一些则会增强。这些变化会影响大气辐射强迫，进而对区域气候和空气质量产生影响。该研究结果对于改进青藏高原地区大气模型，更准确地评估区域气候和空气质量至关重要，也为大气环境遥感技术，例如空气质量监测和卫星观测等提供了重要的科学依据。
topic_words: ['Nitrogen-containing organic compounds', 'Atmospheric oxidation', 'Light absorption', 'Radiative forcing', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Satellite observations', 'Atmospheric composition analysis', 'Qinghai-Tibet Plateau']
authors: Qian Zhang;Ziqi Meng;Zhenxing Shen;Jiaxue Zhao;Bin Zhang;Yaling Zeng;Hongmei Xu;Qiyuan Wang;Steven Sai Hang Ho;Zhihua Li
title: Insight Into the Environment Implication of Primary and Photochemical Aging Processes of Nitrogen‐Containing Organic Chromophores From Residential Fuel Combustion Over Qinghai‐Tibet Plateau
abstract: The Qinghai‐Tibet Plateau (TPL), crucial for the global climate, lacks a comprehensive understanding of nitrogen‐containing organic compound (NOCs) emissions and their impact on light absorption and radiative forcing through atmospheric oxidation. This study examined NOCs from dung and bitumite combustion in the TPL and their atmospheric oxidation by hydroxyl (·OH) and nitrate (·NO3) radicals using an integrated experimental and theoretical approach. Dung produced higher NOC emissions, mainly methyl types, while bitumite emitted more fused‐ring NOCs. Exposure to intense solar radiation resulted in substantial photobleaching of methyl NOCs through hydroxyl (·OH) reactions, reducing the maximum molar absorption at 300–400 nm wavelengths by 76.9%–96.4%. Moreover, nitrate radical (·NO3) oxidation maintained spectral characteristics while producing minor absorption decreases of 48.9%–58.8%. The oxidative aging of fused‐ring NOCs exhibited structure‐dependent responses, wherein both ·NO3 and ·OH oxidation induced photo‐enhancement effects proportional to the number of aromatic rings in the molecular structure.
